title: Selective lithium extraction from brine via chemical reduction of iron phosphate with aqueous iron compounds
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,3902-3916
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00703D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jing Wang, Alex W. Hawkins, Amin T. Saasi, Caroline G. Morin, Geoffrey M. Geise, Gary M. Koenig
Lithium production has increased with surges in demand. Iron based redox mediators were developed to extract Li+ from brine, showing promise using brines with low amounts of lithium and high concentrations of competing ions.
